rows.label: tev014901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev014901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Marcus about Team Irina's fighting style.

rows.label: tev014901_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev014901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Marcus if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev014901_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Marcus about the battle at Oblivia.

rows.label: tev014901_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Marcus about recent developments.

rows.label: tev014901_MSG0001
rows.name:
Before we engage in a big bounty mission,
the whole team always huddles around Irina
and looks up our target in the Enemy Index.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG0002
rows.name:
Once we've worked out our plan of attack,
we head out and engage the foe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG0003
rows.name:
You can use your BLADE-issue comm device to pull
up information on any foe you've fought previously.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG0004
rows.name:
The battles here can be tough, so be sure to put
your Enemy Index to good use, all right?
I'd hate to lose you out there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG0008
rows.name:
There's some pathetic BLADE guy who keeps giving
Irina a hard time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG0009
rows.name:
He's probably just doing it because he likes her,
honestly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG0010
rows.name:
Still, that's no excuse to pull her hair like some
grade-school crush. Man up and ask her out for a
drink or something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG0015
rows.name:
Thank you, [ST:playername ].
Thank you for what you did for us in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG0016
rows.name:
If Colonel Elma hadn't warned us, then right now
Irina and I would be...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG0020
rows.name:
Aw, what are you getting all dramatic about?
If Elma hadn't warned us, I'd have knocked you out
of harm's way myself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG0021
rows.name:
That would have done more damage than
the enemy attack in the first place![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG0022
rows.name:
Oh, please. Everyone on my team knows how to do
a defensive tuck and roll.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG0023
rows.name:
W-well, I guess that would... But I'd still... I mean...
Yeah, you're right, boss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG0025
rows.name:
Sorry if I was being overdramatic. I know that even if
I had gotten hurt, I'd have been okay, since this is a
mimeosome and all...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG0026
rows.name:
But I'm gonna try to stay out of trouble by learning
how to read enemy intentions like Colonel Elma does.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG1018
rows.name:
The pathetic BLADE who's always teasing Irina seems to
have finally gotten his act together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG1019
rows.name:
The other day he brought her a nice bottle of booze
and some snacks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014901_MSG1020
rows.name:
I know Irina's has had her issues with men,
but maybe this would be a good opportunity
for her to try to work through them a bit.[ST:wait ]
